name: Kattastrophix
bio:
KATTASTROPHIX is a dynamic and innovative DJ, singer, and producer  from the San Francisco Bay Area, celebrated for her eclectic mixes and electrifying performances. With a passion for music that embodies the essence of the EDM spirit, KATTASTROPHIX has carved out a unique niche in the electronic music scene. Her signature style seamlessly blends originals and subgenres of house, dubstep, and experimental bass, creating unforgettable and immersive sets that leave audiences craving more.

Her journey began in the underground clubs of Los Angeles, where she honed her craft and built a reputation for pushing boundaries and defying conventions. Over time, KATTASTROPHIX expanded her reach to the digital realm, amassing over 25,000 TikTok followers for her high-energy weekly DJ livestreams. These streams have captivated a global audience, solidifying her presence as a force to be reckoned with in both live and virtual spaces.
